name: One Way Out (amerond)
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2019

A legendary explorer meets his greatest challenge: a mysterious temple with only one exit.

You must navigate each room to find the one door that leads further into the temple. Can you find the treasure before time runs out? There's only one way to find out!

Menu Controls:

  • Just click "New Game"

Controls:

  • Space bar for dialog
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Space bar to jump
  • Walk into a door to open it
  • Most doors are blocked!
  • Enter the final door to progress

Anything above could be a complete lie.

Game, art, and music by Cameron Darragh

@camerondarragh
